price: Ko je taj ko će Allahu lijep zajam dati da bi mu ga On mnogostruko vratio, a uz to će on i nagradu divnu imati?
arabic: مَّن ذَا ٱلَّذِي يُقۡرِضُ ٱللَّهَ قَرۡضًا حَسَنٗا فَيُضَٰعِفَهُۥ لَهُۥ وَلَهُۥٓ أَجۡرٞ كَرِيمٞ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: man dhā alladhī yuq'riḍu al-laha qarḍan ḥasanan fayuḍāʿifahu lahu walahu ajrun karīmun
